mapper.select: select distinct (m.menu_id) menuId, pid, type, menu_name menuName, page, sort, icon, url, hidden from tb_roles_menus rm, tb_menu m where rm.menu_id = m.menu_id and m.deleted = 0 and m.enabled = 1 and rm.role_id in (select r.role_id from tb_users_roles ur, tb_role r where ur.role_id = r.role_id and r.deleted = 0 and r.enabled = 1 and ur.user_id = #{userId})

select distinct (m.menu_id) menuId, pid, type, menu_name menuName, page, sort, icon, url, hidden, enabled, create_by createBy, create_time createTime from tb_menu m where deleted = 0
and menu_name like concat('%', #{menuName}, '%')
and create_time between concat(#{beginDate}, ' 00:00:00') and concat(#{endDate}, ' 23:59:59')

select id, name, value, create_time createTime from tb_icon
name like concat('%', #{iconName}, '%')
order by name
mapper.insert: insert into tb_menu (pid, type, menu_name, page, sort, icon, url, hidden, enabled, create_by, create_time, deleted) values (#{pid}, #{type}, #{menuName}, #{page}, #{sort}, #{icon}, #{url}, #{hidden}, #{enabled}, #{createBy}, now(), 0)
mapper.update: update tb_menu set pid = #{pid}, type = #{type}, menu_name = #{menuName}, page = #{page}, sort = #{sort}, icon = #{icon}, url = #{url}, hidden = #{hidden}, enabled = #{enabled}, update_by = #{updateBy}, update_time = now() where menu_id = #{menuId}
